Message.Title: Geithner: raise debt limit to infinity
Message.Msg: I'd say we're almost at infinity now. People can't grasp the concept of trillions of debt. They wouldn't grasp zillions in debt any better. Are we to believe the debt limit means something? Every time the gov is up against the debt limit they raise it to more unfathomable numbers. So what is the point of a debt limit? We are at infinity.

Topic.Title: Geithner: raise debt limit to infinity

Message.Msg: Phil, I put you in the camp with those who literally are not concerned with the debt. As I think about it, Geithner may have a point. Chaney may have had a point when he said deficits don't matter. So trillions upon trillions in debt really doesn't matter. I need to get used to the concept. Then I can quit worrying about it.
